archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Trust Assurance Framework
archimate:Principle.documentation: A Controlled Document of the Sovrin Governance Framework that defines criteria and processes for assessing conformance of Entities in Sovrin Infrastructure Roles, including the Sovrin Foundation itself, to the policies of the Sovrin Governance Framework. See Appendix A of the Sovrin Governance Framework Master Document and Appendix H.
